SELECT * FROM sys_page_list spl WHERE spl.id NOT IN ( SELECT sfpr.page_id FROM sys_function_page_relation sfpr GROUP BY sfpr.page_id ) AND spl.deleted = false
AND spl.page_name LIKE concat('%', concat(#{pageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
ORDER BY spl.last_updated_date DESC
select fl.id as function_id, fpr.PAGE_ID from sys_function_page_relation fpr , SYS_FUNCTION_LIST fl where fpr.FUNCTION_ID=fl.source_id and fl.tenant_id=${tenantId}
